channel.title: Culture on Simba Tango
channel.description: Recent content in Culture on Simba Tango

item.title: Sport and Culture
item.author: simbatango@gmail.com (Simba)
item.description: byÂ Wigwam Jones People often think of ballroom dancing when they hear I dance tango. Assuming I participate in competitions. And we would not want anybody to think that, would we? It appears absurd to me, but it occurred to me the other day that they assume dancing is about sports. Which it is obviously not. It is all about culture.
